name: testing-benchmarking-infrastructure
description: Testing suite improvements with pytest-benchmark for version-to-version performance comparison: (1) shared fixtures with GPU mocking fallback, (2) benchmark tests across feature engineering, GPU, inference, and validation, (3) feature regression tests for version compatibility, (4) integration tests for training/inference pipelines. Verified on Python 3.10/3.11 trading system with pytest 8.4.
